function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited and diminishing use of park spaces in marginalized communities during the pandemic","Impact":"Widening health disparities in historically marginalized and socially vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Creating innovative solutions to foster healthy and active lifestyles in marginalized communities, addressing the impact of limited park spaces","Technologies":"Community engagement, mobile health apps, virtual fitness programs","People":"Marginalized and socially vulnerable populations","Owner":"Community organizations, local government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate exploration of factors influencing park use in minority communities","Impact":"Unidentified contextual factors that contribute to imbalances in park use across demographic groups","Mitigation":"Conducting research to explore and understand contextual factors impacting park use in minority communities","Technologies":"Community surveys, qualitative interviews, geographic information systems (GIS)","People":"Researchers, community organizations","Owner":"Research institutions, community organizations, local government"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for public health regulations' influence on park use during COVID-19","Impact":"Unaddressed impact of public health regulations on park use in urban areas","Mitigation":"Examining the influence of public health regulations on park use, considering variations in regulations and their impact on community park use","Technologies":"Data analysis, public health policy analysis, community surveys","People":"Public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
